TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListViewPagedDataSource extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.ComponentModel.ITypedList
Public Class ListViewPagedDataSource Implements ICollection, ITypedList
public ref class ListViewPagedDataSource : System::Collections::ICollection, System::ComponentModel::ITypedList

summary.span: 封裝 控制項的分頁相關屬性。

span.span: Encapsulates the paging-related properties of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別屬性，可讓封裝控制項執行分頁。The class encapsulates the properties that enable the control to perform paging. 這個類別會使用可用的最佳方法來列舉相關聯的資料。This class uses the best available method to enumerate the associated data. 如果基礎資料來源支援索引的存取 (例如和物件)，類別會使用該存取權。If the underlying data source supports indexed access (such as and objects), the class uses that access. 否則，類別會使用列舉值所建立的方法。Otherwise, the class uses the enumerator that is created by the method. 如需 類別之執行個體的初始屬性值清單，請參閱 建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 下表所顯示的是 類別之執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the class. |屬性Property|Initial valueInitial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`false`| ||00|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowServerPaging { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否啟用伺服器端分頁。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether server-based paging is enabled.

value.span: 如果啟用伺服器端分頁，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if server-based paging is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定是否啟用伺服器端分頁。Use the property to specify whether server-based paging is enabled. 如果這個屬性設定為`true`，資料來源物件會執行伺服器端分頁。If this property is set to `true`, the data source object performs server-based paging. 否則，控制項執行 UI 型分頁。Otherwise, the control does UI-based paging. 中以 UI 為基礎的分頁，控制項要求所有的記錄從資料來源，並使用目前頁面的。In UI-based paging, the control requests all the records from the data source and uses only the ones for the current page.

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (Array array, int index);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CopyTo(class System.Array array, int32 index) cil managed
public: virtual void CopyTo(Array ^ array, int index);

param.name: array
param.span: 以零起始的 物件，接受從資料來源複製來的項目。

span.span: A zero-based object that receives the copied items from the data source.

param.name: index
param.span: 指定的 物件中要接受複製內容的第一個位置。

span.span: The first position in the specified object to receive the copied contents.

summary.span: 從 中的指定索引開始，將所有的項目從資料來源複製到指定的 。

span.span: Copies all the items from the data source to the specified object, starting at the specified index in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法，將資料來源的內容複製到指定物件，指定索引處開始。Use this method to copy the contents of the data source into the specified object, starting at the specified index. 物件通常用來逐一查看資料來源中的項目。The object is often used to iterate through the items in the data source.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Count As Integer
public: property int Count { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前頁面的資料來源中要使用的項目數目。

span.span: Gets the number of items that will be used from the data source for the current page.

value.span: 目前頁面的資料來源中要使用的項目數目。

span.span: The number of items that will be used from the data source for the current page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷要使用的資料來源的項目數目。Use the property to determine the number of items that will be used from the data source. 傳回的值取決於下列條件：The value returned is determined by the following criteria: - 如果目前的頁面不是最後一頁和屬性設定為大於或等於 0，值的值為會傳回屬性。If the current page is not the last page and the property is set to a value that is greater than or equal to 0, the value of the property is returned. - 如果目前的頁面不是最後一頁和屬性設定為值小於 0 的值，這個值屬性的值減去傳回之前的屬性。If the current page is not the last page and the property is set to a value that is less than 0, the value of the property is subtracted from the value of the property before it is returned. - 如果目前的頁面是最後一頁的值屬性的值減去傳回之前的屬性。If the current page is the last page, the value of the property is subtracted from the value of the property before it is returned. - 如果屬性是`null`，就會傳回 0。If the property is `null`, 0 is returned.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Collections::IEnumerable ^ DataSource { System::Collections::IEnumerable ^ get(); void set(System::Collections::IEnumerable ^ value); };

span.span: Gets or sets the data source.

value.span: 實作表示資料來源之 的物件。

span.span: An object that implements that represents the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用正在呼叫屬性來取得或設定資料來源。Use the property to get or set the data source that is being paged.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DataSourceCount As Integer
public: property int DataSourceCount { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得資料來源中的項目數目。

span.span: Gets the number of items in the data source.

value.span: 資料來源中的項目數目。

span.span: The number of items in the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷資料來源中的項目數目。Use the property to determine the number of items that are in the data source. 如果使用伺服器端分頁，則值會傳回屬性; 否則傳回的資料來源中的項目總數。If server-based paging is used, the value of the property is returned; otherwise, the total number of items in the data source is returned. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性是`null`，就會傳回 0。If the property is `null`, 0 is returned.

exception.span: 資料來源物件不會實作 介面。

span.span: The data source object does not implement the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed

summary.span: 傳回實作 的物件，其中包含資料來源中所有的項目。

span.span: Returns an object that implements and that contains all items in the data source.

returns.span: 物件，包含資料來源中所有的項目。

span.span: An object that contains all items in the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法來取得物件可用來存取資料來源中的個別項目。Use this method to get an object that you can use to access individual items in the data source. 若要存取目前列舉值位置的項目，請使用屬性。To access the item at the current position in the enumerator, use the property. 使用移至下一個項目，集合中的方法。Use the method to move to the next item in the collection. 若要將列舉值移到其原始位置，使用方法。To move the enumerator to its original position, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 當您第一次取得列舉值，或當您呼叫方法，將列舉值移至第一個項目在集合中，您必須呼叫方法。When you first get the enumerator or when you call the method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection, you must call the method. 否則，項目所表示之未定義屬性。Otherwise, the item that is represented by the property is undefined.

summary.span: 傳回 物件，表示使用於繫結資料的屬性。

span.span: Returns a object that represents the properties that are used to bind data.

returns.span: 物件，表示用來繫結資料的屬性。

span.span: The object that represents the properties that are used to bind data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以取得物件，代表用來將資料繫結的屬性。Use the method to obtain a object that represents the properties that are used to bind data. 方法呼叫基礎資料來源物件的方法。The method calls the method of the underlying data source object. 如果屬性是`null`或未實作介面，`null`傳回。If the property is `null` or does not implement the interface, `null` is returned.

summary.span: 這個方法不套用到這個類別。

span.span: This method does not apply to this class.

returns.span: 所有情況下都是空字串。

span.span: An empty string in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法繼承自介面，並不適用於這個類別。This method is inherited from the interface and does not apply to this class. 因此，它會傳回實作所有案例。It has been implemented so that it returns for all cases. 如需 方法的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about the method, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean
public: property bool IsSynchronized { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示對資料來源的存取是否同步處理 (安全執行緒)。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether access to the data source is synchronized (thread-safe).
in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性衍生自介面，並覆寫成一律會傳回`false`，表示此類別不具備執行緒安全。This property is derived from the interface and is overridden to always return `false` , which indicates that this class is not thread-safe. 如需有關屬性，請參閱屬性介面。For more information about the property, see the property of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在此實作中傳回的物件是物件本身。The object returned in this implementation is the object itself. 如需有關屬性，請參閱屬性介面。For more information about the property, see the property of the interface.
